sentence: Hunt won the Academy Award for Academy Award for Best Actress for starring as Carol Connelly in the romantic comedy As Good as It Gets (1997), while her portrayal of Cheryl Cohen-Greene in The Sessions (2012), gained her an additional Academy Awards nomination for Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress.
